feed.title: Combined summary - Web Payments with PaySwarm: Identity (part 1 of 3)

entry.title: Combined summary - Web Payments with PaySwarm: Identity (part 1 of 3)
entry.summary: The article attached to the given link is a valuable resource for those interested in the payment ecosystem of the internet. The piece focuses on Payswarm identity and its possible integration with Bitcoin. It is published on Mozilla Hacks, a platform where developers can share their knowledge and insights. The writer has worked on this subject for over five years, and the content is divided into three parts. The article is highly recommended for anyone who wants to understand the intricacies of online payments and the potential of Payswarm and Bitcoin integration. Manu has been included as a copy recipient in case anyone has any questions about the article.
